description: React component for an Amendment Console interface, including panels for amendment details, simulation, and actions, with API interactions and UI state management.

classes.name: SimulationPanel
classes.description: Component for running and displaying impact simulation results.

classes.name: ActionPanel
classes.description: Component for performing actions like approve, reject, execute on amendments.

classes.name: AmendmentDetail
classes.description: Component displaying detailed information about a specific amendment, including history and actions.

classes.name: AmendmentConsole
classes.description: Main component for listing amendments, filtering, pagination, and showing details.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches amendments data from API based on current page and filter.

methods.name: handleFilter
methods.description: Sets the current filter and resets page and selection.
